name: Lovely Runner
description: Im Sol travels back in time to prevent the tragic fate of her favorite star, Ryu Sun Jae.

name: Stranger Things
description: A group of young friends witness supernatural forces and secret government experiments in their small town.

name: The Crown
description: Follows the reign of Queen Elizabeth II as she navigates political and personal challenges.

name: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer partners with a former student to dominate the drug trade.

name: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind known as 'The Professor' plans the biggest heist in recorded history.
